payload.title: MethodologyModule Tests Complete - 20 EARS Tests
payload.description: Implement comprehensive EARS tests for MethodologyAdapter covering constructor, getTransitionRule, validateSignature, validateCustomRules and reloadConfig methods. Test all standard workflow transitions, signature validation scenarios and custom rules engine.
payload.notes: 20 EARS tests implemented covering all MethodologyAdapter functionality. Tests include constructor with/without config path, all standard workflow transitions (draft→review→ready→active→done→archived), signature validation with capability roles, custom rules engine and config reloading. Full coverage for configurable workflow validation.
